name: One touch Drawing
description:
Design everything with just "One Touch".

Test your brain with an amazing puzzle game.

One touch Drawing is a simple but very addictive puzzle.

The rule is very simple.

Draw figures with just one tap.

The only problem is "You can't draw the same line twice".

According to clear levels, new lines and dots like below will make it difficult.

  1. Line that must be passed twice.

  2. A directional line.

  3. Deformation point.

  4. Steering trigger.

  5. Trigger the way.

  6. Warp Maker.
